title: Futbol Americas: Marsch & Aaronson lead Leeds over Chelsea
description:
On Monday’s episode of Futbol Americas, Herculez Gomez and Mauricio Pedroza react to Brenden Aaronson’s outstanding performance against Chelsea. Then, Jesse Marsch has a sit-down interview with ESPN reporter Tom Hamilton where he discusses his arrival at Leeds and his experience so far being a head coach in the Premier League. Next, we look at the weekend performances of USMNT strikers across Europe. Then we recap the weekend action in Liga MX and MLS.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
